Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: With the Federal Budget just around the corner people are excitedly buzzing about the potential benefits that could potentially head their way. Among the proposed changes is an increase in welfare for struggling single-parent families some of whom will receive up to $175 a fortnight. The Medicare system is also rumored to receive more than $2 billion worth of funding with GP and hospital patients the main benefactors. Finally people are eagerly awaiting the detailed changes that will surely come with the budget's unveiling as Treasurer Jim Chalmers is set to announce several critical changes during his speech.
